ED_Title: Provisional programme of work and timetable of the First Committee for 2021
ED_DecisionText: At its 37th plenary meeting, on 7 December 2020, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the First Committee (A/75/407, para. 5.), approved the provisional programme of work and timetable of the Committee for 2021, as set out in the annex to the report of the Committee (A/75/407).
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
